name: Lesser Catechism of Julianos
text:
The Lesser Catechism of Julianos




Q: What is the domain of Julianos?

A: His domain is Wisdom and Logic.

Q: What is Wisdom?

A: Wisdom is seeing beyond the veil and discovering the true Nature of things.

Q: What is Logic?

A: Logic is the paved road whereupon the mortal may journey from Ignorance to Knowledge.

Q: How does the mortal use Wisdom and Logic?

A: The mortal uses Wisdom and Logic to establish and maintain Law.

Q: What is Law?

A: Law is how the World functions.

Q: Where is Law found?

A: Law is found in all things. Law commands Magnus to rise in the east and set in the west. Law commands a tiny seed to grow into a mighty tree. Law commands the ruler to punish the Law-breaker.

Q: How can Law be determined?

A: Law can be determined through observation and through the declarations of rulers.
